name: SocialDeterminantsOfHealthScreeningAssessments
title: Social Determinants of Health Screening Assessments
description: Not all SDOH domains will have LOINC codes for screening assessment instruments. Those value sets will be added to this group once they are available.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values represents screening assessments for all SDOH domains as selected by the Gravity Project.),(Data Element Scope: This set of values may be used to represent screening assessments in observations, questionnaires, and questionnaire responses for all SDOH domains.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes LOINC codes for SDOH screening assessments as selected by the Gravity Project.),(Exclusion Criteria: NA)
